Package org.waarp.gateway.ftp.control

Exec FTP server control business.

See:
          Description


Class Summary
ExecBusinessHandler BusinessHandler implementation that allows pre and post actions on any operations and specifically on transfer operations
FtpConstraintLimitHandler Constraint Limit (CPU and connection - network and local -) handler.
WaarpActionLogger Class to help to log any actions through the interface of Waarp
 

Package org.waarp.gateway.ftp.control Description

Exec FTP server control business.
